00041 CSwordBookModuleInfo::CSwordBookModuleInfo( const CSwordBookModuleInfo& module )
00042     : CSwordModuleInfo(module)

00050 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::printTree(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00051     if (!target)
00052         target = &treeKey;
00053 
00054   unsigned long currentOffset = target->getOffset();
00055   for (int i = 0; i < level; i++)
00056     cout << "    ";
00057   cout << treeKey.getLocalName() << endl;
00058   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00059     printTree(treeKey, target, level+1);
00060     treeKey.parent();
00061   }
00062   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00063         printTree(treeKey, target, level);
00064 }
00065 
00066 const int CSwordBookModuleInfo::depth() {
00067     if (m_depth == -1) {
00068     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = tree();
00069     if (treeKey) {
00070         TreeKeyIdx root = *treeKey;
00071         root.root();
00072         int level = 0;
00073             computeDepth(root, treeKey, 0);
00074         }
00075     }
00076     return m_depth;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void CSwordBookModuleInfo::computeDepth(TreeKeyIdx treeKey, TreeKeyIdx* target, int level ){
00080     if (!target)
00081         target = &treeKey;
00082 
00083     if (level > m_depth)
00084         m_depth = level;
00085 
00086   if (treeKey.firstChild()) {
00087     computeDepth(treeKey, target, level+1);
00088     treeKey.parent();
00089   }
00090   if (treeKey.nextSibling())
00091         computeDepth(treeKey, target, level);
00092 
00093 }
00094 
00096 TreeKeyIdx* const  CSwordBookModuleInfo::tree() const {
00097     TreeKeyIdx* treeKey = (TreeKeyIdx*)((SWKey*)*(module()));
00098     if (treeKey)
00099         return treeKey;
00100     return 0;
00101 }
